comments:
I'm using build 20011105.

I just tried to synchronize a project, and got an internal error suggesting 
that there are compile problems.  This is weird, there are no error reports in 
the build compile logs.

itoryLocation.java:202)

errors only occur when synchronizing projects that are connected using the 
pserver connection method.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5562 ***

traces.message: Unresolved compilation problem:   PServerConnection cannot  be resolved or is not a type
